sources.title: Phantom of Santa Fe (1936) CINECOLOR
sources.description:
First Time on YouTube! Early CineColor Western!
Stars: Norman Kerry, Nina Quartero, Frank Mayo
Director: Jacques Jaccard

In this Zorroesque adventure, when ruthless bandits loot Mission Guadalupe of its priceless treasures, a foppish dandy dons his mask to hunt down the thieves and return the treasures to the church.

TRIVIA: Originally shot in 1931 as The Hawk, this film received a limited release and then shelved for 5 years. Then Burroughs-Tarzan Enterprises had the original Multicolor process finished in CineColor, and rereleased it in 1936.
